amendment.description: An amendment numbered 37 printed in the Congressional Record to add a provision to the bill that prohibits the use of funds from being used to approve any application for a new drug submitted by an entity that does not agree to a quarterly disclosure of the average price charged by the manufacturer for the most common dosage of the drug in each country that is a member of OECD.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Brown (OH) amendment was withdrawn.
